markdownRemark.html:
There are many different flavors of Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu - the main distribution
  • Kubuntu - KDE based Ubuntu
  • Edubuntu - an Ubuntu tailored for education, includes a nifty LTSP server
  • Xubuntu - A lightweight version of Ubuntu
  • Fluxbuntu - an even lighter version of ubuntu

More!

  • http://www.ubuntustudio.org/
